# mapRect

**Instance Property**

The map rectangle that describes the camera boundary.

## Declaration

```swift
var mapRect: MKMapRect { get }
```

## Discussion

Both the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapView/CameraBoundary-swift.class/mapRect] and the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapView/CameraBoundary-swift.class/region] represent the same camera boundary.

## Accessing the boundary

- **region**: The coordinate region that describes the camera boundary.

items.description: The coordinate region that describes the camera boundary.
